message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $12,000.  I believe it holds significant value and this is a fair starting point for negotiation. What are your thoughts?

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm happy to discuss further, but I'm only able to offer $8,500 at this time.  What are your thoughts?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is my bottom line.  I'm confident it's worth the price, given its value.  I'm happy to part with it for $12,000. What do you say?
